name: combine to 43!
description:
there is a weird contraption in front of you. two conveyor belts going towards the center. and these tokens, they seem to.. combine? you have no idea where you are, why you're here, or what's going on, and yet, somehow, you have the feeling you should try and combine to 43!

this is an abstract strategy counting game, created for godot wild jam #43!

this was my first attempt at a game dev jam, and i hadn't touched godot before this month. it is not entirely finished, obviously, but i am very interested in receiving any feedback, and i'm really glad of all i managed to squeeze in during this time period.

made everything myself, using these free and open source tools: godot engine 3.4.3, inkscape, libresprite, and milkytracker.

(can you find which wildcard was used?)
